General.Name: InterServ International Inc.
General.Description: InterServ International Inc. develops games worldwide. The company is involved in edutainment related activities; and the research, development, and operation of TV/PC/online/Web/mobile games. It also develops PC MMORPG, casual games, console games, and mobile games. InterServ International Inc. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
